channel.title: Data Science Portfolio on Mehdi Khajeh
channel.description: Recent content in Data Science Portfolio on Mehdi Khajeh

item.title: Recommendation with IBM
item.description: Analyzed the interactions that users have with articles on the IBM Watson Studio platform: Performed data cleaning and explanatory data analysis (EDA) before dive into details of recommendations. Made recommendations to them about new articles they will like: Developed Rank-Based recommendations Established User-User based collaborative filtering Used Machine Learning approach to build recommendation based on user-item interactions and matrix decomposition Assessed which methods we might use moving forward for new users and for engaging users (using A/B testing).

item.title: Disaster Response Pipelines
item.description: Went through ETL Pipeline: Extracted, cleaned and finally stored data in SQLite database. Went through Machine Learning Pipeline: Split cleaned data (output of previous step) into a training set and a test set. Created a Machine Learning Pipeline that uses NLTK, as well as scikit-learn’s Pipeline and GridSearchCV for Classification. Exported the model in pickle file. Shared my insights with stakeholders through Flask web app.

item.title: StackOverFlow 2017 Survey Analysis
item.description: Came up with some questions that I was interested in answering. Extracted the necessary data to answer these questions. Performed necessary cleaning, analysis, and modeling. Evaluated how salary is well correlated with some main features of participants (e.g. Gender, Education, Level of experience and etc.). Developed regression model to predict salary using main features determined in previous steps. Shared my insights with stakeholders through Medium. predicted vs. actual result of regression model This Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: Wrangling, Analyzing and Visualization of a Twitter Account
item.description: Wrangled data: Gathered data from different sources Assessed data and prepared summary of assessment for the next step which is cleaning step Cleaned data (resolving both quality and tidiness issues) Showcased the wrangling efforts through analyses and visualizations visualization of results after cleaning This Project’s GitHub Repository

item.title: A/B Test and Logistic Regression Analysis
item.description: Cleaned original data set to have two conclusive groups: Treatment group vs. Control groups Statistical Analysis of cleaned sample data (output of previous step) Defined Null and Alternative hypothesis and went through A/B testing Went through Logistic Regression Approach for the same purpose as A/B testing Made conclusion based on A/B testing and logistic regression. Both A/B testing and logistic regression resulted in making this conclusion that original version of website works better than modified version.

item.title: TMDB Movie Data Base
item.description: Started with Asking some “Research Questions” that I was interested to find answer for them Went through Data Wrangling step based on my interested question Data Gathering Data Assessment Data Cleaning Went through Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) and visualization Summarized limitation and main conclusions obtained from this project Main_Genre Count for all Years for all Genres This Project’s GitHub Repository
